nhc_headline: ...JOHN REFORMS... ...HURRICANE WATCH AND TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF SOUTHERN AND SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary:
...JOHN REFORMS... ...HURRICANE WATCH AND TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF SOUTHERN AND SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
 As of 9:00 AM CST Wed Sep 25
 the center of John was located near 16.2, -101.4
 with movement E at 2 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
